com.heaton.bot
Class Base64OutputStream

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.io.OutputStream
        |
        +--java.io.FilterOutputStream
              |
              +--com.heaton.bot.Base64OutputStream
class Base64OutputStream
extends java.io.FilterOutputStream

This filter is used to 64-bit encode the specified string. This allows a string to be displayed with only ASCII characters. It is also used to provide HTTP authorization. Copyright 2001 by Jeff Heaton

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jeff Heaton
